thread.title: Leeds man says he was left bald after using V05 wax | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Leeds man says he was left bald after using V05 wax | Daily Mail Online

author: Charlie Moore For Mailonline
title: Leeds man says he was left bald after using V05 wax | Daily Mail Online
text: Father, 24, says he was left bald after using a £4 V05 WAX which tore out clumps of his hair Lee Hardy, 24, says he bought VO5 hair wax in January and began to use it The father of one said that a few days later his hair started to fall out in clumps His scalp was ravaged by dry sores and he had no choice but to shave head Mr Hardy was outraged after only receiving a £20 voucher in compensation
